titleStmt.title: Whereas His Majesty hath been certainly informed of the killing and destroying of the game in and about his honour of Hampton-Court ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
James II, King of England, 1633-1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, Henry Hills, and Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: Title from first 3 lines of text.
At head of text: James R.
"Given at our court at Hampton-Court the thirtieth day of July 1687, in the third year of His Majesties reign. By His Majesties command, [countersigned] Middleton."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
